translations.text: By those ˹angels˺ lined up in ranks,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassaffati saffa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and those who diligently drive ˹the clouds˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fazzajirati zajra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and those who recite the Reminder!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fattaliyati thikra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Surely your God is One!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna ilahakum lawahid
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلْمَشَـٰرِقِ

translations.text: ˹He is˺ the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, and the Lord of all points of sunrise.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbu assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma warabbu almashariq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنْيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلْكَوَاكِبِ

translations.text: Indeed, We have adorned the lowest heaven with the stars for decoration
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna zayyanna assamaaaddunya bizeenatin alkawakib
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and ˹for˺ protection from every rebellious devil.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahifthan min kulli shaytaninmarid
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ وَيُقْذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٍ

translations.text: They cannot listen to the highest assembly ˹of angels˺ for they are pelted from every side,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yassammaAAoona ila almala-ial-aAAla wayuqthafoona min kulli janib
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹fiercely˺ driven away. And they will suffer an everlasting torment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Duhooran walahum AAathabun wasib
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَنْ خَطِفَ ٱلْخَطْفَةَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ ثَاقِبٌ

translations.text: But whoever manages to stealthily eavesdrop is ˹instantly˺ pursued by a piercing flare.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa man khatifa alkhatfatafaatbaAAahu shihabun thaqib
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَهُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَم مَّنْ خَلَقْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُم مِّن طِينٍ لَّازِبٍۭ

translations.text: So ask them ˹O Prophet˺, which is harder to create: them or other marvels of Our creation?<sup foot_note=77239>1</sup> Indeed, We created them from a sticky clay.<sup foot_note=77240>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fastaftihim ahum ashaddu khalqan amman khalaqna inna khalaqnahum min teeninlazib
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, you are astonished ˹by their denial˺, while they ridicule ˹you˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal AAajibta wayaskharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: When they are reminded, they are never mindful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha thukkiroo la yathkuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And whenever they see a sign, they make fun of it,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha raaw ayatanyastaskhiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: saying, “This is nothing but pure magic.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo in hatha illasihrun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ

translations.text: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: A-itha mitna wakunnaturaban waAAithaman a-innalamabAAoothoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And our forefathers as well?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa abaona al-awwaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Say, “Yes! And you will be fully humbled.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul naAAam waantum dakhiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنَّمَا هِىَ زَجْرَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَإِذَا هُمْ يَنظُرُونَ

translations.text: It will only take one Blast,<sup foot_note=77241>1</sup> then at once they will see ˹it all˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-innama hiya zajratun wahidatunfa-itha hum yanthuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They will cry, “Oh, woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo ya waylana hathayawmu addeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ ٱلْفَصْلِ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision which you used to deny.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hatha yawmu alfasli allatheekuntum bihi tukaththiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ ٱحْشُرُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ وَأَزْوَٰجَهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ

translations.text: ˹Allah will say to the angels,˺ “Gather ˹all˺ the wrongdoers along with their peers, and whatever they used to worship
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ohshuroo allatheena thalamoowaazwajahum wama kanoo yaAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ فَٱهْدُوهُمْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.text: instead of Allah, then lead them ˹all˺ to the path of Hell.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Min dooni Allahi fahdoohum ilasirati aljaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And detain them, for they must be questioned.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqifoohum innahum masooloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Then they will be asked,˺ “What is the matter with you that you can no longer help each other?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma lakum la tanasaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, on that Day they will be ˹fully˺ submissive.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal humu alyawma mustaslimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They will turn on each other, throwing blame.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdinyatasaaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ كُنتُمْ تَأْتُونَنَا عَنِ ٱلْيَمِينِ

translations.text: The misled will say, “It was you who deluded us away from what is right.”<sup foot_note=77242>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo innakum kuntum ta/toonanaAAani alyameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: The misleaders will reply, “No! You disbelieved on your own.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo bal lam takoonoo mu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيْكُم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍۭ ۖ بَلْ كُنتُمْ قَوْمًا طَـٰغِينَ

translations.text: We had no authority over you. In fact, you yourselves were a transgressing people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama kana lanaAAalaykum min sultanin bal kuntum qawman tagheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَحَقَّ عَلَيْنَا قَوْلُ رَبِّنَآ ۖ إِنَّا لَذَآئِقُونَ

translations.text: The decree of our Lord has come to pass against us ˹all˺: we will certainly taste ˹the punishment˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fahaqqa AAalayna qawlu rabbinainna latha-iqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We caused you to deviate, for we ourselves were deviant.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faaghwaynakum inna kunnaghaween
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Surely on that Day they will ˹all˺ share in the punishment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-innahum yawma-ithin fee alAAathabimushtarikoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: That is certainly how We deal with the wicked.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna kathalika nafAAalu bilmujrimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوٓا۟ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ

translations.text: For whenever it was said to them ˹in the world˺, “There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Allah,” they acted arrogantly
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahum kanoo itha qeela lahumla ilaha illa Allahu yastakbiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِنَّا لَتَارِكُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِرٍ مَّجْنُونٍۭ

translations.text: and argued, “Should we really abandon our gods for a mad poet?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayaqooloona a-inna latarikoo alihatinalishaAAirin majnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: In fact, he came with the truth, confirming ˹earlier˺ messengers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Bal jaa bilhaqqi wasaddaqaalmursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: You will certainly taste the painful torment,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innakum latha-iqoo alAAathabial-aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ

translations.text: and will only be rewarded for what you used to do.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama tujzawna illa makuntum taAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAibada Allahialmukhlaseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They will have a known provision:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika lahum rizqun maAAloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: fruits ˹of every type˺.<sup foot_note=77243>1</sup> And they will be honoured
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawakihu wahum mukramoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: in the Gardens of Bliss,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fee jannati annaAAeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: facing each other on thrones.<sup foot_note=77244>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AAala sururin mutaqabileen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: A drink ˹of pure wine˺ will be passed around to them from a flowing stream:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yutafu AAalayhim bika/sin min maAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: crystal-white, delicious to drink.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Baydaa laththatin lishsharibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَا فِيهَا غَوْلٌ وَلَا هُمْ عَنْهَا يُنزَفُونَ

translations.text: It will neither harm ˹them˺, nor will they be intoxicated by it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La feeha ghawlun walahum AAanha yunzafoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and gorgeous eyes,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaAAindahum qasiratu attarfiAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: as if they were pristine pearls.<sup foot_note=77245>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaannahunna baydun maknoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then they will turn to one another inquisitively.<sup foot_note=77246>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faaqbala baAAduhum AAala baAAdinyatasaaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ قَآئِلٌ مِّنْهُمْ إِنِّى كَانَ لِى قَرِينٌ

translations.text: One of them will say, “I once had a companion ˹in the world˺
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala qa-ilun minhum innee kanalee qareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: who used to ask ˹me˺, ‘Do you actually believe ˹in resurrection˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yaqoolu a-innaka lamina almusaddiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَدِينُونَ

translations.text: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be brought to judgment?’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: A-itha mitna wakunnaturaban waAAithaman a-innalamadeenoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He will ˹then˺ ask, “Would you care to see ˹his fate˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala hal antum muttaliAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then he ˹and the others˺ will look and spot him in the midst of the Hellfire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FattalaAAa faraahu feesawa-i aljaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He will ˹then˺ say, “By Allah! You nearly ruined me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala tallahi in kidtalaturdeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَوْلَا نِعْمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ

translations.text: Had it not been for the grace of my Lord, I ˹too˺ would have certainly been among those brought ˹to Hell˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walawla niAAmatu rabbee lakuntu minaalmuhdareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Then he will ask his fellow believers,˺ “Can you imagine that we will never die,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afama nahnu bimayyiteen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَوْتَتَنَا ٱلْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

translations.text: except our first death, nor be punished ˹like the others˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa mawtatana al-oolawama nahnu bimuAAaththabeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: This is truly the ultimate triumph.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hatha lahuwa alfawzu alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: For such ˹honour˺ all should strive.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Limithli hatha falyaAAmali alAAamiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيْرٌ نُّزُلًا أَمْ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

translations.text: Is this ˹bliss˺ a better accommodation or the tree of Zaqqûm?<sup foot_note=77247>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Athalika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratuazzaqqoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We have surely made it a test for the wrongdoers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna jaAAalnahafitnatan liththalimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٌ تَخْرُجُ فِىٓ أَصْلِ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.text: Indeed, it is a tree that grows in the depths of Hell,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innaha shajaratun takhruju fee aslialjaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: bearing fruit like devils’ heads.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: TalAAuha kaannahu ruoosu ashshayateen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنَّهُمْ لَـَٔاكِلُونَ مِنْهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنْهَا ٱلْبُطُونَ

translations.text: The evildoers will certainly ˹be left to˺ eat from it, filling up their bellies with it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-innahum laakiloona minhafamali-oona minha albutoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمْ عَلَيْهَا لَشَوْبًا مِّنْ حَمِيمٍ

translations.text: Then on top of that they will be given a blend of boiling drink.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma inna lahum AAalayha lashawbanmin hameem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then they will ultimately return to ˹their place in˺ Hell.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma inna marjiAAahum la-ila aljaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, they found their forefathers astray,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahum alfaw abaahum dalleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: so they rushed in their footsteps!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fahum AAala atharihimyuhraAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And surely most of the earlier generations had strayed before them,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad dalla qablahum aktharual-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: although We had certainly sent warners among them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad arsalna feehim munthireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: See then what was the end of those who had been warned.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fanthur kayfa kanaAAaqibatu almunthareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAibada Allahialmukhlaseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, Noah cried out to Us, and how excellent are We in responding!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad nadana noohunfalaniAAma almujeeboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We delivered him and his family<sup foot_note=77248>1</sup> from the great distress,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanajjaynahu waahlahu mina alkarbialAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and made his descendants the sole survivors.<sup foot_note=77249>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalna thurriyyatahu humualbaqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And We blessed him ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watarakna AAalayhi fee al-akhireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: “Peace be upon Noah among all peoples.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Salamun AAala noohinfee alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹For˺ he was truly one of Our faithful servants.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu min AAibadinaalmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then We drowned the others.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma aghraqna al-akhareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And indeed, one of those who followed his way was Abraham.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna min sheeAAatihi la-ibraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when he came to his Lord with a pure heart,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith jaa rabbahu biqalbinsaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعْبُدُونَ

translations.text: and said to his father and his people, “What are you worshipping?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala li-abeehi waqawmihi mathataAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Is it false gods that you desire instead of Allah?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: A-ifkan alihatan doona Allahitureedoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: What then do you expect from the Lord of all worlds?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama thannukum birabbialAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He later looked up to the stars ˹in contemplation˺,<sup foot_note=77250>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fanathara nathratanfee annujoom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: then said, “I am really sick.”<sup foot_note=77251>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqala innee saqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So they turned their backs on him and went away.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatawallaw AAanhu mudbireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ

translations.text: Then he ˹stealthily˺ advanced towards their gods, and said ˹mockingly˺, “Will you not eat ˹your offerings˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faragha ila alihatihimfaqala ala ta/kuloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: What is wrong with you that you cannot speak?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma lakum la tantiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then he swiftly turned on them, striking ˹them˺ with his right hand.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faragha AAalayhim darban bilyameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Later, his people came rushing towards him ˹furiously˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faaqbaloo ilayhi yaziffoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He argued, “How can you worship what you carve ˹with your own hands˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala ataAAbudoona ma tanhitoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: when it is Allah Who created you and whatever you do?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallahu khalaqakum wamataAAmaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ ٱبْنُوا۟ لَهُۥ بُنْيَـٰنًا فَأَلْقُوهُ فِى ٱلْجَحِيمِ

translations.text: They said ˹to one another˺, “Build him a furnace and cast him into the blazing fire.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo ibnoo lahu bunyananfaalqoohu fee aljaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And so they sought to harm him, but We made them inferior.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faaradoo bihi kaydan fajaAAalnahumual-asfaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالَ إِنِّى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهْدِينِ

translations.text: He later said, “I am leaving ˹in obedience˺ to my Lord. He will guide me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqala innee thahibun ilarabbee sayahdeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: My Lord! Bless me with righteous offspring.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbi hablee mina assaliheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: So We gave him the glad tidings

translations.text: So We gave him good news of a forbearing son.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fabashsharnahu bighulamin haleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ ٱلسَّعْىَ قَالَ يَـٰبُنَىَّ إِنِّىٓ أَرَىٰ فِى ٱلْمَنَامِ أَنِّىٓ أَذْبَحُكَ فَٱنظُرْ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ ۚ قَالَ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ ٱفْعَلْ مَا تُؤْمَرُ ۖ سَتَجِدُنِىٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ

translations.text: Then when the boy reached the age to work with him, Abraham said, “O my dear son! I have seen in a dream that I ˹must˺ sacrifice you. So tell me what you think.” He replied, “O my dear father! Do as you are commanded. Allah willing, you will find me steadfast.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma balagha maAAahu assaAAyaqala ya bunayya innee ara fee almanamiannee athbahuka fanthur mathatara qala ya abati ifAAal ma tu/marusatajidunee in shaa Allahu mina assabireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then when they submitted ˹to Allah’s Will˺, and Abraham laid him on the side of his forehead ˹for sacrifice˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma aslama watallahuliljabeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: And We called out to him

translations.text: We called out to him, “O Abraham!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanadaynahu an ya ibraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ ٱلرُّءْيَآ ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

translations.text: You have already fulfilled the vision.” Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qad saddaqta arru/yainna kathalika najzee almuhsineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: That was truly a revealing test.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna hatha lahuwa albalaoalmubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And We ransomed his son with a great sacrifice,<sup foot_note=77252>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafadaynahu bithibhinAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and blessed Abraham ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watarakna AAalayhi fee al-akhireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: “Peace be upon Abraham.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Salamun AAala ibraheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: This is how We reward the good-doers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika najzee almuhsineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He was truly one of Our faithful servants.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu min AAibadinaalmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: And We gave him glad tidings

translations.text: We ˹later˺ gave him good news of Isaac—a prophet, and one of the righteous.<sup foot_note=77253>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wabashsharnahu bi-ishaqanabiyyan mina assaliheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَبَـٰرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ ۚ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ مُبِينٌ

translations.text: We blessed him<sup foot_note=77254>1</sup> and Isaac as well. Some of their descendants did good, while others clearly wronged themselves.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wabarakna AAalayhi waAAalaishaqa wamin thurriyyatihima muhsinunwathalimun linafsihi mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And We certainly showed favour to Moses and Aaron,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad mananna AAala moosawaharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: And We saved both of them

translations.text: and delivered them and their people from the great distress.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanajjaynahuma waqawmahumamina alkarbi alAAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We helped them so it was they who prevailed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanasarnahum fakanoohumu alghalibeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: And We gave both of them

translations.text: We gave them the clear Scripture,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waataynahuma alkitabaalmustabeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translation.text: And We guided both of them

translations.text: and guided them to the Straight Path.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahadaynahuma assirataalmustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And We blessed them ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watarakna AAalayhima fee al-akhireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: “Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Salamun AAala moosawaharoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They were truly ˹two˺ of Our faithful servants.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahuma min AAibadinaalmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And Elias was indeed one of the messengers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna ilyasa lamina almursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when he said to his people, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala liqawmihi alatattaqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Do you call upon ˹the idol of˺ Ba’l and abandon the Best of Creators—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AtadAAoona baAAlan watatharoona ahsanaalkhaliqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allaha rabbakum warabba aba-ikumual-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But they rejected him, so they will certainly be brought ˹for punishment˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakaththaboohu fa-innahum lamuhdaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAibada Allahialmukhlaseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We blessed him ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watarakna AAalayhi fee al-akhireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: “Peace be upon Elias.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Salamun AAala il yaseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna kathalika najzee almuhsineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He was truly one of Our faithful servants.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahu min AAibadinaalmu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And Lot was indeed one of the messengers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lootan lamina almursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when We delivered him and all of his family,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith najjaynahu waahlahuajmaAAeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: except an old woman,<sup foot_note=77255>1</sup> who was one of the doomed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAajoozan fee alghabireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then We ˹utterly˺ destroyed the rest.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma dammarna al-akhareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: You ˹Meccans˺ certainly pass by their ruins day
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innakum latamurroona AAalayhim musbiheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and night. Will you not then understand?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wabillayli afala taAAqiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And Jonah was indeed one of the messengers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna yoonusa lamina almursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when he fled to the overloaded ship.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith abaqa ila alfulki almashhoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then ˹to save it from sinking,˺ he drew straws ˹with other passengers˺. He lost ˹and was thrown overboard˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fasahama fakana mina almudhadeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then the whale engulfed him while he was blameworthy.<sup foot_note=77256>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faltaqamahu alhootu wahuwamuleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Had he not ˹constantly˺ glorified ˹Allah˺,<sup foot_note=77257>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falawla annahu kana minaalmusabbiheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَطْنِهِۦٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ

translations.text: he would have certainly remained in its belly until the Day of Resurrection.<sup foot_note=77258>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lalabitha fee batnihi ilayawmi yubAAathoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But We cast him onto the open ˹shore˺, ˹totally˺ worn out,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fanabathnahu bilAAara-iwahuwa saqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and caused a squash plant to grow over him.<sup foot_note=77259>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanbatna AAalayhi shajaratan minyaqteen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ مِا۟ئَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ

translations.text: We ˹later˺ sent him ˹back˺ to ˹his city of˺ at least one hundred thousand people,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waarsalnahu ila mi-ati alfinaw yazeedoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: who then believed ˹in him˺, so We allowed them enjoyment for a while.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faamanoo famattaAAnahum ilaheen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Ask them ˹O Prophet˺ if your Lord has daughters,<sup foot_note=77260>1</sup> while the pagans ˹prefer to˺ have sons.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fastaftihim alirabbika albanatuwalahumu albanoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِنَـٰثًا وَهُمْ شَـٰهِدُونَ

translations.text: Or ˹ask them˺ if We created the angels as females right before their eyes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am khalaqna almala-ikata inathanwahum shahidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, it is one of their ˹outrageous˺ fabrications to say,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ala innahum min ifkihim layaqooloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: “Allah has children.” They are simply liars.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walada Allahu wa-innahum lakathiboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Has He chosen daughters over sons?<sup foot_note=77261>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Astafa albanati AAalaalbaneen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma lakum kayfa tahkumoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Will you not then be mindful?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afala tathakkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Or do you have ˹any˺ compelling proof?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Am lakum sultanun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Then bring ˹us˺ your scripture, if what you say is true!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa/too bikitabikum in kuntum sadiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلُوا۟ بَيْنَهُۥ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ ٱلْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ

translations.text: They have also established a ˹marital˺ relationship between Him and the jinn. Yet the jinn ˹themselves˺ know well that such people will certainly be brought ˹for punishment˺.<sup foot_note=77262>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAaloo baynahu wabayna aljinnatinasaban walaqad AAalimati aljinnatu innahum lamuhdaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Glorified is Allah far above what they claim!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Subhana Allahi AAammayasifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa AAibada Allahialmukhlaseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Surely you ˹pagans˺ and whatever ˹idols˺ you worship
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-innakum wama taAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: can never lure ˹anyone˺ away from Him
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma antum AAalayhi bifatineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: except those ˹destined˺ to burn in Hell.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa man huwa sali aljaheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٌ مَّعْلُومٌ

translations.text: ˹The angels respond,˺ “There is not one of us without an assigned station ˹of worship˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama minna illa lahumaqamun maAAloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: We are indeed the ones lined up in ranks ˹for Allah˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lanahnu assaffoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And we are indeed the ones ˹constantly˺ glorifying ˹His praise˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna lanahnu almusabbihoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: They certainly used to say,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in kanoo layaqooloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكْرًا مِّنَ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translations.text: “If only we had a Reminder like ˹those of˺ earlier peoples,<sup foot_note=77263>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Law anna AAindana thikranmina al-awwaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: we would have truly been Allah’s devoted servants.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Lakunna AAibada Allahialmukhlaseen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: But ˹now˺ they reject it, so they will soon know.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakafaroo bihi fasawfa yaAAlamoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Our Word has already gone forth to Our servants, the messengers,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walaqad sabaqat kalimatuna liAAibadinaalmursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: that they would surely be helped,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innahum lahumu almansooroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and that Our forces will certainly prevail.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna jundana lahumu alghaliboon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: So turn away from the deniers for a while ˹O Prophet˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatawalla AAanhum hatta heen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: You will see ˹what will happen to˺ them, and they too will see!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waabsirhum fasawfa yubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Do they ˹really˺ wish to hasten Our punishment?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AfabiAAathabina yastaAAjiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَآءَ صَبَاحُ ٱلْمُنذَرِينَ

translations.text: Yet when it descends upon them:<sup foot_note=77264>1</sup> how evil will that morning be for those who had been warned!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-itha nazala bisahatihimfasaa sabahu almunthareen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And turn away from them for a while.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watawalla AAanhum hatta heen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: You will see, and they too will see!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waabsir fasawfa yubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: سُبْحَـٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

translations.text: Glorified is your Lord—the Lord of Honour and Power—above what they claim!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Subhana rabbika rabbi alAAizzatiAAamma yasifoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Peace be upon the messengers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wasalamun AAala almursaleen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And praise be to Allah—Lord of all worlds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walhamdu lillahirabbi alAAalameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
